hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="drupal" published_version="8.4.5"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- export work_dir=`pwd`
#Install build dependencies sudo apt-get update -y export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive #sudo sed -i "s/^exit 101$/exit 0/" /usr/sbin/policy-rc.d sudo -E apt-get install -y mysql-server sudo apt-get -y install apache2 composer curl libapache2-mod-php7.1 php7.1 php7.1-xml php7.1-gd php7.1-ldap php7.1-mysql php7.1-bcmath php7.1-mbstring tar unzip wget
#Update Apache configuration sudo chmod 777 /etc/apache2/apache2.conf
sudo sed -i '166s/AllowOverride None/AllowOverride All/' /etc/apache2/apache2.conf
sudo echo -e "ServerName localhost" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "AddType application/x-httpd-php .php" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "<Directory />" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e " DirectoryIndex index.php " >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "</Directory>" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf
#Enable Apache rewrite module sudo a2enmod rewrite
#Initialize MySQL server
sudo /usr/sbin/mysqld --initialize --user=mysql --datadir=/var/lib/mysql/data sleep 60s
sudo mkdir -p /var/run/mysqld sudo chown mysql:mysql /var/run/mysqld #sudo chmod 777 -R /var/run/mysqld
#Create database and grant privileges to 'drupal' user sudo /usr/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql & sleep 90s
sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create database drupal" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create user 'drupal'@'localhost' identified by 'drupal'" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "grant all privileges on drupal.* to 'drupal'@'localhost' identified by 'drupal' with GRANT OPTION"
#Install Drupal cd $work_dir wget https://ftp.drupal.org/files/projects/drupal-8.4.5.tar.gz tar -zxvf drupal-8.4.5.tar.gz sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html/Drupal cd drupal-8.4.5 sudo mv * .htaccess .csslintrc .editorconfig .eslintignore .eslintrc.json .gitattributes /var/www/html/Drupal cd /var/www/html/Drupal composer install
#Set Permissions sudo mkdir sites/default/files sudo chmod a+w sites/default/files sudo chmod a+w sites/default sudo cp sites/default/default.settings.php sites/default/settings.php sudo chmod a+w sites/default/settings.php
sudo cp /home/test/work/Drupal_8.4.3/settings.php sites/default/settings.php
#Start Apache Http Server sudo service apache2 start
cd mysql -u drupal -pdrupal drupal < /home/test/work/Drupal_8.4.3/drupal.sql sleep 60s wget -q http://127.0.0.1:80/Drupal -O - | grep Welcome
